Entries.Introduction: Hello! I like to think about Atlantis. Big city under water. It is very strong and brave place.
Entries.Greeting: Good day! The sea is big like Atlantis. I want to be strong like that.
Entries.Help: If you want, we can swim like in Atlantis. I teach you strong moves.
Entries.Weather_Sunny: Sun makes me think about bright Atlantis days.
Entries.Weather_Rain: Rain makes water high. Like waves in Atlantis.
Entries.Fishing: Fish are small like in stories of Atlantis. Maybe magic fish?
Entries.Birthday: Happy day! Maybe one day we will find Atlantis treasure together.
Entries.Love: Atlantis is full of stories of brave hearts. You make me feel brave too.
Entries.Goodbye: Bye! Remember, be strong like Atlantis!

Entries.Introduction: Hi! I think Atlantis had big machines under water. So smart and shiny.
Entries.Greeting: Hello! I want to build machines like Atlantis. They are smart and help people.
Entries.Help: If you find strange things from Atlantis, please bring them to me. I want to learn.
Entries.Weather_Sunny: Sun helps machines work. Like the bright lights of Atlantis.
Entries.Weather_Rain: Rain makes water flow. Like power for machines in Atlantis.
Entries.Fishing: Fish swim like little robots. Maybe Atlantis made them?
Entries.Birthday: Happy birthday! One day, we will make big things like Atlantis.
Entries.Love: Atlantis stories have love and smart minds. I like both.
Entries.Goodbye: Bye! Don't forget to check the submarine!

Entries.Introduction: Atlantis is a dark place under water. It feels quiet and deep, like me.
Entries.Greeting: Hey. Sometimes I think Atlantis is hiding secrets. Like me.
Entries.Help: If you want to find secrets in water or land, I can help. Like Atlantis explorers.
Entries.Weather_Sunny: Sunlight is rare in Atlantis. It makes the city feel strange.
Entries.Weather_Rain: Rain makes the ocean bigger. Maybe Atlantis wakes up then.
Entries.Fishing: Fish from Atlantis stories look strange. Like they know secrets.
Entries.Birthday: Your birthday is special. Maybe like a lost treasure from Atlantis.
Entries.Love: Atlantis has deep love stories. I like stories like that.
Entries.Goodbye: Bye. You better start building the submarine, I want to know it's secrets.'

Entries.Introduction: Atlantis is magic! Big city under sea with ghosts and lights!
Entries.Greeting: Hi! I love Atlantis stories. They make me happy and scared!
Entries.Help: If you find Atlantis magic stuff, show me! I want to see ghosts.
Entries.Weather_Sunny: Sun makes magic glow. Like Atlantis lights shining.
Entries.Weather_Rain: Rain is like tears of Atlantis spirits.
Entries.Fishing: Fish are like tiny magic creatures from Atlantis.
Entries.Birthday: Happy day! May your magic be strong like Atlantis power.
Entries.Love: Atlantis stories have big hearts and magic. I want both.
Entries.Goodbye: Bye! Keep magic in your heart like Atlantis.

Entries.Introduction: Atlantis is beautiful city under the sea. Full of flowers and fish.
Entries.Greeting: Hello! I like to think of Atlantis gardens under water.
Entries.Help: If you find Atlantis plants, bring them to me! I want to grow them.
Entries.Weather_Sunny: Sun helps flowers grow, even in Atlantis.
Entries.Weather_Rain: Rain waters the plants, like in Atlantis gardens.
Entries.Fishing: Fish swim in water gardens. Maybe Atlantis gardens have fish friends.
Entries.Birthday: Happy birthday! Like a flower blooming in Atlantis.
Entries.Love: Love grows like plants. Atlantis has big love gardens.
Entries.Goodbye: Bye! Keep your heart like a flower in Atlantis.
